about_the_game:
Game Type


The Void Chronicles: One's Desolation is a horror/adventure where you play as a young noble who recently met a suitor who wants her hand in marriage. You quickly find out this suitor is nefarious and has the power to bend reality. You must do everything in power to escape his grasp, even asking help from a demon. Solve intricate puzzles, immerse yourself in a engrossing story and talk your way out of danger.

This game is similar to Pocket Mirror Goldenertraum and Mad Father. There is an emphasis on solving puzzles, storytelling and character relationships.

Features/Gameplay


- Solve intricate puzzle to unlock the way forward.
- Imperative Chats: Discussions between two characters that holds the fate of your character in your hands. Choose wisely or it can spell doom for them
- Meet a cast of characters that forge alliances of self interest but find out which bonds are genuine and which are not
- Visit many extraordinary places from dark cliff sides, the void of space or a distortion of your own home

short_description: One day, Adele tells her daughter Liridona she's set up an arranged marriage with Prince Nathaniel. Everything seems to be going well between the two until Liridona hears something she shouldn't have from the prince. So, can she escape from Nathaniel's grasp or will she succumb to his persistence?
